TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 968
TEI.2.document_title: Political Chief to Ayuntamiento of Nacogdoches, 05-23-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Political chief to Ayuntamiento of Nacogdoches, Bexar, May 23, 1833. Transmits copy of reply to Ayuntamiento of San Felipe refusing to indorse petition for separation from Coahuila. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 968

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Political chief to Ayuntamiento of Nacogdoches, Bexar, May 23, 1833. Transmits copy of reply to Ayuntamiento of San Felipe refusing to indorse petition for separation from Coahuila. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*,*date_mentioned n="05-23-1833"> May 23, 1833*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*From Bexar Archives*/p*
*/div1*
